document_data.name: Petathal
document_data.mainbody: '''Petathal''' was a large island located somewhere west across the sea from [[Faer√ªn]], and south of the [[Korinn Archipelago]].
document_data.History: Some time before the 13{{th}} century [[DR]],{{Cite dragon/362/Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes|28}}<ref group="note" name="date">This approximated date was derived from the [http://web.archive.org/web/20090602124758/http://www.wizards.com/default.asp?x=dnd/drfe/20080110&pf=true ''Grand History of the Realms: The Moonshaes''] stating that [[Viledel]] settled the land in [[1228 DR]] and the adventure itself stating, ''"The Korinn Archipelago was discovered about 200 years ago . . . From 140 years ago to 100 years ago, the pirates reigned supreme..."'' this chain of islands was conquered by [[Northlander]]s. Later in [[1228 DR]], a noble [[adventurer]] from this island named [[Viledel]] led a band of [[human]]s and [[demihuman]]s across the sea to the Korinn Archipelago, seeking to colonize the lands and aspiring to one day create a strong maritime empire.<ref group="note" name="date" />
